text: Myanmar's newest war is in one of its

what's known as the cocaine special

and civilians killed the reason the

phone Josh in from five years of exile
in China apart from their soldiers this
is now a ghost town a normally vibrant

a small group moving towards the border
CheY CheY is a han and says she
hasn't felt safe since soldiers arrived
in town ethnically Chinese but
recognized as a burmese group in the
last week 30,000 am are thought to
have fled into China just behind those
houses over there is the Chinese border
now the Chinese have an awkward problem
at the moment the three most active
Burmese rebel groups are all operating
along this frontier Beijing is stressing
that it wants peace and stability but
there are certainly officials and
businessman in China who are profiting
from the wars here some of the displaced
who don't have Chinese heritage have
headed to the Burmese town of lash oh
where a large monastery has opened its

week
this is your husband I tell my daughter
that her father was killed in a battle
but she doesn't understand she still
thinks he's alive somewhere six months
